p: With the rapid growth of the world's population and the increasing consumption of energy, environmental pollution caused by energy consumption has attracted wide attention. China has a population of 1.3 billion, accounting for 18.57% of the world's population. Also, China is the world's second largest economy ( Barboza, 2010), and its food consumption and role in environmental protection cannot be ignored.
